data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Itapúa, Paraguay to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Itapúa, Paraguay
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Itapúa.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Itapúa words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Itapúa, Paraguay to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Itapúa, Paraguay who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Itapúa.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: There are 484,300 people living in the state of Itapúa. Only about 38,806 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Itapúa, Paraguay has a population of 484,300.

We estimate Itapúa has 38,806 people who might know Jesus, 424,161 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 21,334 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

location.name: Itapúa
location.cities_list: Posadas, Encarnación, Candelaria, Carmen del Paraná, San Cosme y Damián
location.cities_list_w_pop: Posadas (323,739), Encarnación (74,983), Candelaria (11,039), Carmen del Paraná (4,196), San Cosme y Damián (2,223)
